name: Crock
description:
60 challenging levels, lovely pixel art graphics and an addictive gameplay packed with lot of explosions and chain reactions. 

Test your skills with this old style puzzle game.

Installation:

  • Download the crock package
  • Unzip into the preferred folder
  • Double click on crock.exe

Default controls:

Move blocks left : ←
Move blocks right: →
Fast fall: ↓
Rotate blocks: ↑

The game have a pretty basic controller support (for now), common gamepads should work correctly, just connect them before starting the game
